<< plot3 Graphics functions quiver >>

prism

Prism colormap array.

Syntax

c = prism
c = prism(m)

Input argument

m

a scalar integer value: Number of colors (256 as default value).

Output argument

c

Prism colormap array.

Description

prism returns the colormap with prism colors.

Example

f = figure();
surf(peaks);
colormap('prism');

See also

colormap.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
